\newcommand{\STdrule}[4][]{{\displaystyle\frac{\begin{array}{l}#2\end{array}}{#3}\quad\STdrulename{#4}}}
\newcommand{\STusedrule}[1]{\[#1\]}
\newcommand{\STpremise}[1]{ #1 \\}
\newenvironment{STdefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]}{}
\newenvironment{STfundefnblock}[3][]{ \framebox{\mbox{#2}} \quad #3 \\[0pt]\begin{displaymath}\begin{array}{l}}{\end{array}\end{displaymath}}
\newcommand{\STfunclause}[2]{ #1 \equiv #2 \\}
\newcommand{\STnt}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\STmv}[1]{\mathit{#1}}
\newcommand{\STkw}[1]{\mathbf{#1}}
\newcommand{\STsym}[1]{#1}
\newcommand{\STcom}[1]{\text{#1}}
\newcommand{\STdrulename}[1]{\textsc{#1}}
\newcommand{\STcomplu}[5]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2\in #3 #4 #5}}
\newcommand{\STcompu}[3]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2<#3}}
\newcommand{\STcomp}[2]{\overline{#1}^{\,#2}}
\newcommand{\STgrammartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{llcllllll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\STmetavartabular}[1]{\begin{supertabular}{ll}#1\end{supertabular}}
\newcommand{\STrulehead}[3]{$#1$ & & $#2$ & & & \multicolumn{2}{l}{#3}}
\newcommand{\STprodline}[6]{& & $#1$ & $#2$ & $#3 #4$ & $#5$ & $#6$}
\newcommand{\STfirstprodline}[6]{\STprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\STbindspecprodline}[6]{\STprodline{#1}{#2}{#3}{#4}{#5}{#6}}
\newcommand{\STprodnewline}{\\}
\newcommand{\STinterrule}{\\[5.0mm]}
\newcommand{\STafterlastrule}{\\}
\newcommand{\STmetavars}{
\STmetavartabular{
 $ \STmv{term\_var} ,\, \STmv{x} ,\, \STmv{y} ,\, \STmv{z} $ &  \\
 $ \STmv{type\_var} ,\, \STmv{X} $ &  \\
 $ \STmv{const} ,\, \STmv{c} ,\, \STmv{k} ,\, \STmv{f} $ &  \\
 $ \STmv{type\_const} ,\, \STmv{U} ,\, \STmv{S} $ &  \\
 $ \STmv{ivar} ,\, \STmv{i} ,\, \STmv{j} $ &  \\
}}

\newcommand{\STarities}{
\STrulehead{\STnt{arities}}{::=}{}\STprodnewline
\STfirstprodline{|}{ \textsf{Term} }{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{ \textsf{Type} }{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{ \STkw{Term} ^{ \STmv{i} } \Rightarrow  \STkw{Term} }{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\STtype}{
\STrulehead{\STnt{type}  ,\ \STnt{T}  ,\ \STnt{A}  ,\ \STnt{B}  ,\ \STnt{C}}{::=}{}\STprodnewline
\STfirstprodline{|}{\STmv{U}}{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{\STmv{X}}{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{ \STnt{T}  \to  \STnt{T'} }{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{ \STnt{A} \times \STnt{B} }{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{ \STnt{A} + \STnt{B} }{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{\STsym{(}  \STnt{T}  \STsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\STterm}{
\STrulehead{\STnt{term}  ,\ \STnt{t}}{::=}{}\STprodnewline
\STfirstprodline{|}{\STmv{c}}{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{\STmv{f} \, \STmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \STmv{x_{\STmv{i}}}}{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{\STmv{x}}{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{ \lambda  \STmv{x}  .  \STnt{t} }{}{\textsf{bind}\; \STmv{x}\; \textsf{in}\; \STnt{t}}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{\STnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}}{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{\STsym{(}  \STnt{t}  \STsym{)}} {\textsf{S}}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\STG}{
\STrulehead{\Gamma}{::=}{}\STprodnewline
\STfirstprodline{|}{\STmv{x}  \STsym{:}  \STnt{T}}{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{\STsym{.}}{}{}{}{}\STprodnewline
\STprodline{|}{\Gamma  \STsym{,}  \Gamma'}{}{}{}{}}

\newcommand{\STgrammar}{\STgrammartabular{
\STarities\STinterrule
\STtype\STinterrule
\STterm\STinterrule
\STG\STafterlastrule
}}

% defnss
% defns JTyping
%% defn typing
\newcommand{\STdruleVar}[1]{\STdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \STsym{,}  \STmv{x}  \STsym{:}  \STmv{S}  \STsym{,}  \Gamma'  \vdash  \STmv{x}  :  \STmv{S} }{%
{\STdrulename{Var}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\STdruleConst}[1]{\STdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \STmv{c}  :  \STmv{U} }{%
{\STdrulename{Const}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\STdruleFun}[1]{\STdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \STmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \STsym{:}  \STmv{S_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \STsym{,} \, ... \, \STsym{,}  \STmv{x_{\STmv{i}}}  \STsym{:}  \STmv{S_{\STmv{i}}}  \vdash  \STmv{f} \, \STmv{x_{{\mathrm{1}}}} \, ... \, \STmv{x_{\STmv{i}}}  :  \STmv{U} }{%
{\STdrulename{Fun}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\STdefntyping}[1]{\begin{STdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t}  :  \STnt{T} $}{}
\STusedrule{\STdruleVar{}}
\STusedrule{\STdruleConst{}}
\STusedrule{\STdruleFun{}}
\end{STdefnblock}}

%% defn defeq
\newcommand{\STdruleRefl}[1]{\STdrule[#1]{%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t}  =  \STnt{t}  :  \STnt{T} }{%
{\STdrulename{Refl}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\STdruleSym}[1]{\STdrule[#1]{%
\STpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \STnt{T} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  =  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  :  \STnt{T} }{%
{\STdrulename{Sym}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\STdruleTrans}[1]{\STdrule[#1]{%
\STpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \STnt{T} }%
\STpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  =  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \STnt{T} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{3}}}}  :  \STnt{T} }{%
{\STdrulename{Trans}}{}%
}}


\newcommand{\STdruleSubst}[1]{\STdrule[#1]{%
\STpremise{ \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \STnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}} }%
\STpremise{ \Gamma  \STsym{,}  \STmv{x}  \STsym{:}  \STnt{T_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \vdash  \STnt{t}  =  \STnt{t'}  :  \STnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }%
}{
 \Gamma  \vdash  \STsym{[}  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  \STsym{/}  \STmv{x}  \STsym{]}  \STnt{t}  =  \STsym{[}  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  \STsym{/}  \STmv{x}  \STsym{]}  \STnt{t'}  :  \STnt{T_{{\mathrm{2}}}} }{%
{\STdrulename{Subst}}{}%
}}

\newcommand{\STdefndefeq}[1]{\begin{STdefnblock}[#1]{$ \Gamma  \vdash  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{1}}}}  =  \STnt{t_{{\mathrm{2}}}}  :  \STnt{T} $}{}
\STusedrule{\STdruleRefl{}}
\STusedrule{\STdruleSym{}}
\STusedrule{\STdruleTrans{}}
\STusedrule{\STdruleSubst{}}
\end{STdefnblock}}


\newcommand{\STdefnsJTyping}{
\STdefntyping{}\STdefndefeq{}}

\newcommand{\STdefnss}{
\STdefnsJTyping
}

\newcommand{\STall}{\STmetavars\\[0pt]
\STgrammar\\[5.0mm]
\STdefnss}
